SELECT p_no, p_title, p_uno, modified_date, p_thumbnail, p_like_cnt, p_comment_cnt, p_view_cnt FROM posts
ORDER BY modified_date DESC, p_like_cnt DESC
ORDER BY p_like_cnt DESC, modified_date DESC
WHERE p_no IN (SELECT r_pno FROM repositorys WHERE r_uno=#{uNo}) ORDER BY modified_date DESC, p_like_cnt DESC
WHERE p_uno IN (SELECT f_follewed_no FROM follows WHERE f_follower_no = #{uNo}) ORDER BY modified_date DESC, p_like_cnt DESC
LIMIT #{rowNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , 10
